Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory1.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Liv, keep your distance!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "You'll need to learn to use different types of defenses to complete a kill.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "You and Lucia have different tactic systems, you can't just imitate an Attacker's battle style.", 4: '1'}
{1: '100', 2: 'Lee is such a great teacher.', 3: '13', 4: "Lee's explanations are so easy to understand.", 5: '14'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I was just sharing my own experience.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I just often analyze how Constructs can help boost a Construct's abilities.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Hopefully, through analyzing information in the database, Constructs will have a chance to further improve themselves.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You really are something else, Lee.', 3: '17'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'What are you buttering me up for?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm just being honest.", 3: '20', 4: 'What? Is it that strange?', 5: '21'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I just smell that something's up...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm just messing with you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "You're not this petty, now are you, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If it's nothing, then I'll get back to helping Liv.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Um... I can carry on training myself from here...', 4: '1'}
